text: [Music]
hi I'm Paul Gruber I have trained
millions of people from all around the
world on how to speak perfect English
and I am so excited because now I'm
coming to Vietnam to work with you live
and in person
I'm going to show you things that you've
never learned before let me start out by
saying that I am not an English teacher
but I am a speech-language pathologist
as well as the creator of the
pronunciation workshop program what I do
is teach you how to speak English
clearly correctly and confidently when I
arrive in Vietnam I will be conducting
some very large events and I'm telling
you you have got to be there we are
going to have a great time this training
is going to completely change how you
speak English it's going to help your
career and it's going to brighten your
future English has become the most
powerful language whether you are from
China or France or Russia or Mexico or
Malaysia or even Vietnam English
connects all of us and once you learn to
speak it well it will make you an
international citizen of the world let
me tell you about my training it is like
nothing you have ever seen it's much
different than an English class you know
what it's like it's similar to a music
class my training is like getting voice
or singing lessons it's fun and you will
be smiling the whole time
what I need from you is to be willing to
make mistakes because that is the only
way you are going to learn you need to
be able to recognize your speaking
errors in English and compare that to
how you should be saying the words and
when you hear those differences that is
how you improve now when you come to my
training I want you to realize that I
don't teach you anything
big there is nothing complicated there's
nothing difficult I teach you these
little things these easy things like how
to reshape your vowels how to push
certain syllables in a word and how to
make these small changes with your mouth
that are going to have a huge impact on
the way you sound and most importantly
how people understand you and at the end
of the day you are going to leave
feeling very different you will learn to
speak English with power and with
confidence I promise you you will not be
wasting your time when you come and see
me you are going to gain so much I am
thrilled to be teamed up with langmaster
international they have invited me to
your beautiful country and they are
organizing these amazing events listen
seats are limited so please register
early before it's too late I need you to
come with energy and enthusiasm and
excitement and I want you to be ready to
learn we are going to have a great time
together and know that my training is
truly about to change your life I can't
wait to see you until we meet I'm
sending you my best wishes and I'll see
you soon
[Music]
